title: Deer smashes through window of Long Island hair salon – video
text: A deer crashed through the window of a Long Island hair salon Saturday and ran amok before breaking out the front door with a straightening iron in tow. The buck's surprise visit to the Be.you.tiful salon in Lake Ronkonkoma was captured by the salon's security camera. The buck ran to the break room at the back of the shop, came back out and hit a mirror, then ran out with an iron caught on its antlers. Police said one client suffered leg and head pain and was treated at a hospital. It is unknown how the deer fared after the dramatic visit.
description: A deer crash through the window of a hair salon, leaves through the front door with a straightening iron
